Hello,

1) Please take a screenshot of your ship. Press F1, go to this website, upload, and paste in the "direct" link.

2) Have you tried adding SAS (different than ASAS) parts on the rocket? (Most ships usually only need one SAS, but bigger ones may need more.)

3) Adding and strategically placing RCS will probably help.

Edited April 28, 2013 by AustralianFries

Another deciding factor: how far away from your centre of mass is your thrust? Very long rockets, no matter how many ASAS units you put on, will tend to tumble as the atmosphere thins. A screenshot will help us greatly.
